name: A New Kind of World Computer... Atoms, Not Smart Contracts
description: The internet is a protocol for sharing files. The Vanilla EVM serves as a protocol for a shared computer, governed by account-centric permissions, much like our personal computers - leading to ownership-centric apps. Instead, the 'shared computer protocol' of our universe is governed by physics, not accounts - leading to the most emergent world we know of. Can we replicate this?

speakers.name: Wand
speakers.bio: In the pursuit of a powerful internet where our use of computing shifts from mere tasks and productivity towards tools for exploration, modeling, coordination, and worldbuilding. Interested in The Design Directions: New Representations for New Mediums, Plural Worldbuilding, Digital Physics, Language of Truth, Simulation + Creation Markets.
